name: Froggy: The Game
description:
a horror game about a guy named Dave who accidenty fell to river and the river transformed him into a River Monster named FROGGY. He is green and rusty and his body parts are similiar to frog parts. So he went in all locations to kill you because of you, he felled to the river. PS1 Styled graphics horror game based on a Book Series named Froggy
